span.span: Represents a pseudo-random number generator, which is a device that produces a sequence of numbers that meet certain statistical requirements for randomness.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 伪随机数字从一组有限的数字选择以相同的概率。Pseudo-random numbers are chosen with equal probability from a finite set of numbers. 所选的数字不是完全随机的因为使用数学算法来选择它们，但它们是足够随机实用的角度而言。The chosen numbers are not completely random because a mathematical algorithm is used to select them, but they are sufficiently random for practical purposes. 当前实现类基于 Donald E.Knuth 删减随机数生成器算法的修改版本。The current implementation of the class is based on a modified version of Donald E. 构造函数使用您提供一个显式的种子值。The constructor uses an explicit seed value that you supply. - 构造函数使用系统时钟提供种子值。The constructor uses the system clock to provide a seed value. 这是实例化的随机数生成器的最常见的方法。This is the most common way of instantiating the random number generator. 如果针对单独使用同一个种子对象，它们会生成相同的一系列随机数字。If the same seed is used for separate objects, they will generate the same series of random numbers. 这可用于创建测试套件，以处理随机值，或者用于重播从随机数字派生其数据的游戏。This can be useful for creating a test suite that processes random values, or for replaying games that derive their data from random numbers. 但请注意，在不同版本的.NET Framework 下运行的进程中的对象可能会返回不同系列的随机数字，即使它们使用相同的种子值实例化。However, note that objects in processes running under different versions of the .NET Framework may return different series of random numbers even if they're instantiated with identical seed values. 若要生成不同的随机数字序列，可在种子值依赖于时间，从而生成包含的每个新实例的不同序列。To produce different sequences of random numbers, you can make the seed value time-dependent, thereby producing a different series with each new instance of . 参数化构造函数可以采用值基于计时周期数中的当前时间，而无参数构造函数使用系统时钟生成种子值。The parameterized constructor can take an value based on the number of ticks in the current time, whereas the parameterless constructor uses the system clock to generate its seed value. 不过，由于时钟具有有限的解决方法，使用无参数构造函数来创建不同关闭连续对象创建生成的随机数的相同序列生成器。However, because the clock has finite resolution, using the parameterless constructor to create different objects in close succession creates random number generators that produce identical sequences of random numbers. 下面的示例演示了两个关闭连续实例化的对象生成的随机数的相同序列。The following example illustrates how two objects that are instantiated in close succession generate an identical series of random numbers. 在大多数 Windows 系统中，的另一个 15 毫秒内创建的对象很可能会有相同的种子值。On most Windows systems, objects created within 15 milliseconds of one another are likely to have identical seed values. 避免多个实例化Avoiding multiple instantiations 初始化在紧凑循环中或在短期内的两个随机数字生成器将创建两个随机数字生成器可能会产生相同的随机数字序列。Initializing two random number generators in a tight loop or in rapid succession creates two random number generators that can produce identical sequences of random numbers. 在大多数情况下，这不是开发人员的意图，可能会导致性能问题，因为实例化和初始化随机数生成器是一个代价相对较大的过程。In most cases, this is not the developer's intent and can lead to performance issues, because instantiating and initializing a random number generator is a relatively expensive process. 同时以提高性能并避免无意中创建单独的随机数生成器生成相同的数字序列的我们建议创建一个对象随着时间推移，而不是创建生成很多随机数字新对象生成一个随机数字。Both to improve performance and to avoid inadvertently creating separate random number generators that generate identical numeric sequences, we recommend that you create one object to generate many random numbers over time, instead of creating new objects to generate one random number. 但是，类不是线程安全。However, the class isn't thread safe. 如果调用方法从多个线程，请按照下一节中介绍的指导方针。If you call methods from multiple threads, follow the guidelines discussed in the next section. ## System.Random 类和线程安全The System.Random class and thread safety 而不是实例化个人对象，我们建议创建单个实例来生成你的应用程序所需的所有随机数字。Instead of instantiating individual objects, we recommend that you create a single instance to generate all the random numbers needed by your app. 但是，对象不是线程安全。However, objects are not thread safe. 如果您的应用程序调用从多个线程的方法，您必须使用同步对象来确保只有一个线程可以访问一次的随机数生成器。If your app calls methods from multiple threads, you must use a synchronization object to ensure that only one thread can access the random number generator at a time. 如果您不确保线程安全的方式访问对象，对返回随机数字的方法的调用将返回 0。If you don't ensure that the object is accessed in a thread-safe way, calls to methods that return random numbers return 0. 下面的示例使用 C# [lock 语句](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/lock-statement.md)和 Visual Basic [SyncLock 语句](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/synclock-statement.md)以确保单个随机数生成器的 11 个线程访问以线程安全的方式。The following example uses the C# [lock Statement](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/lock-statement.md) and the Visual Basic [SyncLock statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/synclock-statement.md) to ensure that a single random number generator is accessed by 11 threads in a thread-safe manner. 每个线程生成 2 亿个随机数字、 随机数字生成的计数和计算其总和，并执行完后，然后更新所有线程的总计值。Each thread generates 2 million random numbers, counts the number of random numbers generated and calculates their sum, and then updates the totals for all threads when it finishes executing. [!code-cpp[System.Random#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Random/cpp/threadsafeex1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Random#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Random/cs/threadsafeex1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Random#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Random/vb/threadsafeex1.vb#3)] 该示例按以下方式将确保线程安全：The example ensures thread-safety in the following ways: - 属性用于定义跟踪生成的随机数字和其总和为每个线程的总数的线程本地变量。The attribute is used to define thread-local variables that track the total number of random numbers generated and their sum for each thread. - 锁 ( `lock` C# 中的语句和`SyncLock`在 Visual Basic 中的语句) 来保护对变量的总计数和所有在所有线程上生成的随机数字的总和的访问。A lock (the `lock` statement in C# and the `SyncLock` statement in Visual Basic) protects access to the variables for the total count and sum of all random numbers generated on all threads. - 信号量 (对象) 用于确保主线程阻止，直到所有其他线程完成执行。A semaphore (the object) is used to ensure that the main thread blocks until all other threads complete execution. - 该示例将检查是否随机数字生成器遭到破坏通过确定是否为随机数字生成方法的两个连续调用将返回 0。The example checks whether the random number generator has become corrupted by determining whether two consecutive calls to random number generation methods return 0. 如果检测到损坏情况，该示例使用对象发出信号，应取消所有线程。If corruption is detected, the example uses the object to signal that all threads should be canceled. - 在生成之前每个随机数字，每个线程检查状态对象。Before generating each random number, each thread checks the state of the object. 如果请求取消，则示例将调用方法来取消线程。If cancellation is requested, the example calls the method to cancel the thread. 下面的示例等同于第一个，只不过它使用对象和 lambda 表达式而不是对象。The following example is identical to the first, except that it uses a object and a lambda expression instead of objects. [!code-csharp[System.Random#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Random/cs/threadsafeex2.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Random#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Random/vb/threadsafeex2.vb#4)] 它不同于第一个示例通过以下方式：It differs from the first example in the following ways: - 变量来跟踪生成的随机数字数和每个任务中的其总和是本地的任务，这样就无需使用属性。The variables to keep track of the number of random numbers generated and their sum in each task are local to the task, so there is no need to use the attribute. - 静态方法用于确保主线程未完成之前完成所有任务。The static method is used to ensure that the main thread doesn't complete before all tasks have finished. 无需为对象。There is no need for the object. - 从任务取消生成的异常显示在方法。The exception that results from task cancellation is surfaced in the method. 在上一示例中，它是由每个线程进行处理。In the previous example, it is handled by each thread. ## 生成不同类型的随机数字Generating different types of random numbers 随机数生成器提供方法，可生成以下类型的随机数字：The random number generator provides methods that let you generate the following kinds of random numbers: - 一系列值。A series of values. 通过传递数组初始化为所需的方法以返回到的元素数确定的字节值的数目方法。You determine the number of byte values by passing an array initialized to the number of elements you want the method to return to the method. 下面的示例生成 20 个字节。The following example generates 20 bytes. [!code-cpp[System.Random#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Random/cpp/nextbytes1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Random#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Random/cs/nextbytes1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Random#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Random/vb/nextbytes1.vb#5)] - 一个整数。A single integer. 可以选择是否想从 0 到最大值的整数 ( – 1) 通过调用方法中，介于 0 和通过调用特定的值之间的整数方法或通过调用值的范围内的整数方法。You can choose whether you want an integer from 0 to a maximum value ( – 1) by calling the method, an integer between 0 and a specific value by calling the method, or an integer within a range of values by calling the method. 在参数化的重载，指定的最大值是独占;也就是说，生成的实际最大数目是其中一个小于指定值。In the parameterized overloads, the specified maximum value is exclusive; that is, the actual maximum number generated is one less than the specified value. 下面的示例调用方法，以便生成 10 个随机数字介于-10 到 10 之间。The following example calls the method to generate 10 random numbers between -10 and 10. 请注意该方法的第二个参数指定的方法返回的随机值的范围不含上限。Note that the second argument to the method specifies the exclusive upper bound of the range of random values returned by the method. 换而言之，该方法可返回一个的最大整数小于此值。In other words, the largest integer that the method can return is one less than this value. 如何使用 System.Random 到...How do you use System.Random to… 以下各节讨论并提供了几种可能想要在应用中使用的随机数的示例代码。The following sections discuss and provide sample code for some of the ways you might want to use random numbers in your app. ### 检索相同的随机值序列Retrieve the same sequence of random values 有时你想要在软件测试方案和玩游戏生成相同的随机数字序列。Sometimes you want to generate the same sequence of random numbers in software test scenarios and in game playing. 使用相同的随机数字序列进行测试，可检测回归，并确认 bug 修复。Testing with the same sequence of random numbers allows you to detect regressions and confirm bug fixes. 在游戏中使用相同的随机数字序列可以重播以前的游戏。Using the same sequence of random number in games allows you to replay previous games. 可以通过提供到相同的种子值生成相同的随机数字序列构造函数。You can generate the same sequence of random numbers by providing the same seed value to the constructor. 种子值为伪随机数字生成算法提供一个起始值。The seed value provides a starting value for the pseudo-random number generation algorithm. 下面的示例使用 100100 作为任意种子值来实例化对象，显示 20 个随机浮点值，并且仍然存在种子值。The following example uses 100100 as an arbitrary seed value to instantiate the object, displays 20 random floating-point values, and persists the seed value. 然后还原的种子值、 实例化新的随机数字生成器，并显示相同的 20 个随机浮点值。It then restores the seed value, instantiates a new random number generator, and displays the same 20 random floating-point values. 请注意该示例可能会产生不同的随机数字序列，是否在不同版本的.NET Framework 上运行。Note that the example may produce different sequences of random numbers if run on different versions of the .NET Framework. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认种子值派生自系统时钟，具有有限的分辨率。The default seed value is derived from the system clock and has finite resolution. 因此，不同关闭连续通过调用默认构造函数创建的对象将具有相同的默认种子值，并因此，将生成的随机数的相同集。As a result, different objects that are created in close succession by a call to the default constructor will have identical default seed values and, therefore, will produce identical sets of random numbers. 为避免此问题，只需使用单个对象来生成所有的随机数字。This problem can be avoided by using a single object to generate all random numbers. 此外可以通过修改系统时钟返回的种子值，然后显式提供此新的种子值到变通解决它构造函数。You can also work around it by modifying the seed value returned by the system clock and then explicitly providing this new seed value to the constructor. 有关详细信息，请参阅构造函数。For more information, see the constructor. 如果你想在随机数生成器来生成一个随机数字序列，则调用此构造函数。Call this constructor if you want your random number generator to generate a random sequence of numbers. 若要生成的随机数的将是相同的不同的随机数生成器固定的序列，请调用使用固定的种子值的构造函数。To generate a fixed sequence of random numbers that will be the same for different random number generators, call the constructor with a fixed seed value . 这测试使用的随机数的应用程序时，经常使用构造函数重载。This constructor overload is frequently used when testing apps that use random numbers. 一旦已实例化的随机数生成器，就调用各个方法，如或、 生成随机数字。Once you've instantiated the random number generator, you call individual methods, such as or , to generate random numbers. ## Examples 下面的示例使用默认构造函数来实例化三个对象，并为每个显示五个随机整数的序列。The following example uses the default constructor to instantiate three objects and displays a sequence of five random integers for each. 因为前两个关闭连续创建对象，使用基于系统时钟的完全相同的种子值实例化，并因此会生成相同的随机数字序列。Because the first two objects are created in close succession, they are instantiated using identical seed values based on the system clock and, therefore, they produce an identical sequence of random numbers. 另一方面，第三个的默认构造函数对象调用后通过调用而导致的两秒延迟方法。On the other hand, the default constructor of the third object is called after a two-second delay caused by calling the method. 因为这将产生第三个不同的种子值对象，它会生成不同的随机数字序列。Because this produces a different seed value for the third object, it produces a different sequence of random numbers.
